title: Episode 238 - Andrew Coe Interview
itunes:title: Episode 238 - Andrew Coe Interview
description: It’s been a while since we’ve spoken about rugby 7s on the show and today is the day we finally change that as we speak with Canadian rugby 7s player Andrew Coe about the sport in Canada and his Olympic experiences! We find out from Andrew just how playing soccer got him into the sport and what the rugby scene was like growing up for him. We also find out just what it is like facing down the All Blacks during a World Cup match, and also comparing his experiences of competing at both a Rugby World Cup and an Olympic Games. Added to that we find out his incredible story around the emotional journey the Olympics took him on, as well as finding out just why he has a bit of an obsession with Starbucks. It’s a great chat that you won’t want to miss!
